about_the_game:
1. Game introduction:
It’s a relaxing and casual adventure game where you have to operate the piggy to play this fun game of heading balls and win the final victory. At the same time, two-player level enables you to get more fun. It must be the game of choice for a two-person competition at friends’ party!

2. About the game:
Piggy Prter Adventure is a game featured with adventure, easy but flexible, helping the piggy to pass every challenge successfully in different scenes.

3. How to play:
It’s probably the most adorable adventure game you’ve ever played.
With the control of direction keys (up, down, left and right), you help the piggy to head more balls to win the game in one after another scenes.
Meanwhile, there are a number of game scenes (beach, forest, grassland, etc.) and many kinds of clothes (of cowboy, gentleman, etc.) you could choose.
And the linked modes make you feel you’re in the game world.

4. Game features:
Super cute piggy figure make you love it once you see it.
Easy operation allows you to get started very quickly.
Flexible game ways let you show your skills off.
Levels linked together enable you to feel like you’re in an adventure world.
Funny heading balls game let you increase your finger flexibility and enjoy the fun from it.
And various levels, such as Blue Mountain, the old village, sunny beach, mushroom house, the grassland with sunset, dark forest, etc. make the game fun and abundant.

With the levels moving forward, different scenes and the rivals with a faster speed give you a more comfortable game experience.
Come to challenge!
